title: About Us
description: We are a consultancy specialized in digital transformation and industrial innovation. We combine technical expertise with strategic vision to help you implement smart, scalable, and sustainable solutions in your operations.
missionText: At Trioptimo, our mission is to empower SMEs to achieve leadership in their respective markets. We act as a strategic ally, turning invisible processes into visible results. We strive to make every company more efficient, more profitable, and fundamentally, more human. We firmly believe that by transforming SMEs, we also transform the lives of those who make them possible.
visionText: We aspire to become the number one ally for SMEs, applying process engineering, technology, and business intelligence to optimize operations, reduce costs, and solve real problems. Our vision is based on a deeply human approach, where technology serves to improve people's lives and organizational performance.
commitmentDescription: At Trioptimo, our business success goes hand in hand with a positive social impact. We promote an inclusive and equitable work environment, valuing and developing each talent. Sustainability is key to our operations, ensuring responsible growth that benefits everyone. We are proud to collaborate for free with NGOs and non-profit organizations, contributing our knowledge and resources to strengthen their missions and build a better future. At Trioptimo, we believe in the power of unity for true social change.
CTACommitment: Are you an NGO? Let us help!

ceos.name: Jano Neuen Centeno
ceos.bio: Industrial Engineer with over 8 years of experience in process optimization and industrial project implementation. His practical and analytical approach has helped many SMEs reduce costs without compromising quality.
ceos.commitment: “I believe in turning engineering into real solutions that impact the daily lives of companies and their teams.”

ceos.name: Ignacio Davanzo
ceos.role: Head of Digital Transformation and Technology.
ceos.bio: Information Systems Engineer and digital transformation expert, with extensive experience in implementing Industry 4.0 technologies and process digitalization. He specializes in adapting technology to each company’s reality and resources.
ceos.commitment: “My mission is to bring technological innovation closer to SMEs so they can compete and grow without losing their essence.”

ceos.name: Nahuel Deschutter
ceos.role: Head of Data Analysis and Business Intelligence.
ceos.bio: Specialist in data analysis and Business Intelligence, with experience in applying Big Data to optimization and decision-making in industrial companies. He applies practical models to turn complex data into useful information.
ceos.commitment: “I believe that data is the best tool for making accurate and sustainable decisions.”
